none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 17, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
Mad Max was on a fukkn tear in 1985. Ninety plus minutes of knuckle busting hardcore, hip swinging rock 'n roll and snotty punk all packed in real tight (because it all belongs together, of course) as broadcast on the evening of December 17th. The broadcasts from UC Berkeley's KALX that Pat left behind will be a source of joy and/or wonder for many many more year, long after I've stopped sharing them here...KALX - MAD MAX17 DECEMBER 1985===Other Mad Max broadcasts here. And three more volumes of the 'Wright Copy' series compiled from Pat's extensive archive will be ready for consumption in August. 
https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/search?q=kalx+mad+max

seo.title: KALX - Mad Max - 17 December 1985 - Terminal Escape
